question: With which bank Bharat Petroleum Launched rewarding fuel co-branded credit card in the country?
explanation: SBI Card, the credit card issuer and Bharat Petroleum, the leading petroleum company in India announced the launch of the BPCL SBI Card - the most rewarding fuel co-branded credit card in the country. The BPCL SBI Card will offer up to 70 litres of free fuel per year to cardholders. The Cardholders can earn rewards and save on fuel at 14000 Bharat Petroleum fuel stations across the country, making the BPCL SBI Card the only fuel co-brand card with such an extensive reach. It has been launched on the Visa platform.
